item.title: Cohere’s smallest, fastest R-series model excels at RAG, reasoning in 23 languages
item.description: Cohere's Command R7B uses RAG, features a context length of 128K, supports 23 languages and outperforms Gemma, Llama and Ministral.

item.title: Synthetic data has its limits — why human-sourced data can help prevent AI model collapse
item.description: With model degradation, AI development could stall, leaving AI systems unable to ingest new data and essentially becoming “stuck in time.”
